com.geodrop.DropOut

Class SMSJobsScheduledModify

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geodrop.GeodropRequest
      • com.geodrop.DropOut.SMSJobsScheduledModify

  • public class SMSJobsScheduledModify
extends GeodropRequest
    Request used to modify a scheduled message, adding or removing recipients, changing its message text, its custom sender or its scheduled time
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    A-Tono s.r.l.

      • getJobId

        The job id of the job to modify

      • getMessageText

        Returns:
        Text of the message

      • getMsisdnToDelete

        public Vector<String> getMsisdnToDelete()
        Returns:
        The vector of msisdns to delete; each msisdn is in E.164 format with '+'

      • getMsisdnToAdd

        public Vector<String> getMsisdnToAdd()
        Returns:
        The vector of msisdns to add; each msisdn is in E.164 format with '+'

      • getTpoa

        public String getTpoa()
        Returns:
        Used to specify the personalized sender

      • getDeferredTime

        public Date getDeferredTime()
        Returns:
        Date and time in the format "Y-m-d H:i:s", used to send the message to a certain date, if not specified the message is sent immediately
